Header.title: JewelX ERP
Header.paragraph: Empowering jewelers with streamlined operations, enhanced customer management, and optimized inventory control for a sparkling business transformation.

About.paragraph: Empowering jewelers with streamlined operations, enhanced customer management, and optimized inventory control for a sparkling business transformation.

Services.name: Money Lending (Girvi)
Services.text: Flexible Interest Setups , Separate Trial With Intt.Calculations,Transparent Terms and Conditions,Collateralized Loans.

Services.name: Multi-Store Management
Services.text: Manage multiple store locations from a centralized system, including inventory synchronization, sales reporting, and centralized customer management.

Services.name: Updates and Enhancements
Services.text: Provide regular software updates and enhancements to add new features, improve performance, ensuring the software remains up-to-date and reliable.

Services.name: Gemstone Management
Services.text: Manage gemstone inventory, including tracking gemstone attributes such as type, carat weight, clarity, and certification details.

Services.name: Customized Financial Reports
Services.text: Generate customized financial reports, such as income statements, balance sheets, cash flow statements, and profitability analysis.

Services.name: ADD - ONS
Services.text: Monthly Saving Scheme,Multiple Branch Management,Accounting - Stock - GST - MIS,Repair and Maintenance Services

Features.title: Marketing Services
Features.text: Email or SMS marketing integration for promotions and updates.Customer feedback and review management

Features.title: Security and Compliance
Features.text: Ensure data security and compliance with industry regulations . Secure backup and data recovery procedures.

Features.title: Customer Relationship
Features.text: Maintain customer profiles with contact information, purchase history.Build and maintain strong relationships with customers to enhance loyalty and satisfaction.

Features.title: Inventory Management
Features.text: Track inventory levels for various types of jewelry (e.g., rings, necklaces, earrings),Barcode or RFID tagging for easy tracking.
